analysis.description:
Crowdsale.determineStatus (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#448-467) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- endBlock == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.devAllocation (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#554-567):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalTokensSent.add(_amount) <= token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#559-560)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokensSent (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#564-565)

Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#685-686) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#27-28)

TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#292-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,currentTokenToRelease) (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#302-303)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.contribute (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#605-642):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whiteList.isWhiteListed(_backer)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#611)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ethReceivedMain (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#625)
	- ethReceivedPresale (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#631)
	- holdersIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#619-620)
	- tokenHolders (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#632-634)
	- tokenHolders (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#634-635)
	- tokensSentMain (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#625-626)
	- tokensSentPresale (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#631-632)
	- totalTokensSent (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#636)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.devAllocation (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#554-567):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalTokensSent.add(_amount) <= token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#559-560)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- devIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#561)
	- tokenHolders (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#562)
	- tokensSentDev (/unique_chucks/14/0x8644663047df80c1626261065070da7a5350ada3.sol#564)
